I organize workshops on export control of  commodities that have both a military and civilian use (dual-use commodities) for front-line enforcement officers (Customs and Border Guards), export license reviewers, and enterprises that produce those commodities.  My portfolio of countries includes the countries of the Caucasus region (Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia), Russia, and Ukraine.  My portfolio previously included Central Asia. lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: of KARMA so that the world may also help my foundation too.  http://causes.com/HM2S
lenders.occupational_info:
Folks who suffer OCD and many other different conditions can often "pass" in society with little or no suspicion. Not so with compulsive hair-pulling (Trichotillomania), which highjacks a person's peace of mind and their looks.  Current estimates there are 1-2 out of 50 people living with Trichotillomania.

As the owner of a hair specialty salon for hair loss and hair disorders, Charlene Blacer saw first-hand the great need of this underserved population and founded Help Me 2 Stop.org, a charitable organization which provides grants for Trichotillomania sufferers to receive free or affordable cosmetic treatments to help boost their morale and get them on the road to recovery.

lenders.name: Branimir
lenders.occupation: founder of Green Point Of View
lenders.loan_because:
What is Green Point Of View?
We are a non-profit organization with a wide range of activities.

What are our goals?
By uniting with other organizations and personals we aim for improving the environment that we live in. For the development of our projects we will establish scientific and technical knowledge exchange with other organizations. We also want to remodel the social behavior so that it is not that self destructive.

How are we going to achieve our goals?
Our initiative is very serious and will undoubtedly be a great challenge but with hard work and constancy we can change the world we live in. We have the most important thing - the green point of view. Everything else is achievable.

How can you help us?
Everybody who takes our idea as his can help us with just an idea as well as sponsorship. We will appreciate your help. You can be sure that the nature will do too.
lenders.occupational_info:
The necessity of funds to implement the specific campaigns and development of new projects remains open. Therefore, we address to you to ask you to invest your spare money in one ideal purpose.

If you are sympathetic to our cause and want to be a part of it make a donation in favor of the organization for the project "Take a breath - plant a tree”.
